nodes.bodyText: please load those images from the Artemis server and NOT from the Github URL!

A third assessor, other than the original assessor will then be able to re-assess... Something is off here. Either other than the original assessors - plural, because there have to be two before a third comes, or A second assessor, ....

Not really an issue but more a matter of taste, I'd rewrite No stable internet connection? Not an issue. All changes made by the students are saved locally and automatically synced every 30 seconds. as All changes made by the students are saved locally and automatically synced every 30 seconds to avoid issues with instable internet connections. which sounds more formal to me. You can keep it as is if you think it is better.
Furthermore, You can preset... => Furthermore, you can preset...

Add an unlimited amount of exercises from most Artemis exercise types.: I'm not sure what that is supposed to mean. "most"? Imo this would read better as Create an unlimited amount of exercises from Artemis' default exercise types. (I assume that is what was meant here.)

students decide between working with the integrated code editor or can clone the repository and work on the exercise on their IDE of choice => students decide between working with the integrated code editor and cloning the repository, working on the exercise on their IDE of choice
Wait, I think it is better if we host this ourselves! Don't we have FA included already?

yes, please use the local version.
It's really bad practice to link to external URLs like this
Do we need to load external fonts? What about using the same font setup as elsewhere?

I agree, please use the same font as in all other places.
It's really bad practice to link to external URLs like this
